casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. PAUL D. HILL (AC 15872)

O’Connell, C. J., and Hennessy and Shea, Js.

Argued September 24 officially released October 7, 1997 Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by State v. Andrews, 33 Conn. App. 590, 637 A.2d 787, cert. denied, 229 Conn. 908, 640 A.2d 121 (1994).

The judgment is affirmed.
